Title: No More Rain World
Description:
Also known as World or Not So Rain World.
Removes the Rain and replaces it with a night that holds a very distinct ecosystem. Dawn adds the functionality of a full day night cycle!
Has Support for Vanilla, MSC and watcher regions! (although bugs will most likely be present outside of vanilla regions)
PLACE THIS MOD ABOVE EVERYTHING ELSE IN YOUR REMIX LOAD ORDER!

Contains Night threats (Made by Qwertz) for all the vanilla regions! MSC and extra regions will come in the future.

Also contains support for a handful of mods! (REGION MODS HAVE THE SAME SPAWNS AT NIGHT!)

When playing with other mods NMRW needs to be at the TOP of the load order! I cannot guarantee compatibility for mods outside of the list below. LOAD ORDER CHANGES WILL TAKE LONGER TO GO THROUGH WITH NMRW! Its a HUGE amount of files to merge!

Should be Compatible with Rain Meadow!
